statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DatabaseName , AA.DbmsType , AA.ServerID , AA.ConnectionString , AA.Description , BB.ServerName , M1.Name as DbmsTypeName FROM dbo.TDatabase AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TServer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ServerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.DbmsType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'DbmsType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ServerID = #ServerID#
AND AA.DatabaseName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DatabaseName , AA.DbmsType , AA.ServerID , BB.ServerName , AA.ConnectionString , AA.Description FROM dbo.TDatabase AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TServer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ServerID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TDatabase ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, DatabaseName, DbmsType, ServerID, ConnectionString, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #DatabaseName#, #DbmsType#, #ServerID#, #ConnectionString#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TDatabase SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, DatabaseName= #DatabaseName# , DbmsType = #DbmsType# , ServerID = #ServerID# , ConnectionString = #ConnectionString# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
